title: Software Engineer (Remote - Germany)
description:
About the job
Jobgether is a Talent Matching Platform that partners with companies worldwide to efficiently connect top talent with the right opportunities through AI-driven job matching.

One of our companies is currently looking for a (Senior) Software Engineer (f/m/d) Fullstack/Backend in Germany.

We are seeking a skilled and motivated (Senior) Software Engineer (f/m/d) with a focus on backend development and fullstack capabilities. You'll work in a cross-functional team developing scalable platform solutions that support a consistent and smooth user experience across multiple domains. You will contribute to the design, development, deployment, and maintenance of critical platform services using modern technologies like Java, TypeScript, and AWS. This is a great opportunity for someone passionate about clean code, cloud infrastructure, and agile collaboration to make a meaningful impact in a product-driven environment.

Accountabilities:

 Collaborate with cross-functional teams including software, QA, and data engineers
 Develop and evolve key services in an event-driven microservices architecture
 Build and maintain backend APIs using Java and TypeScript
 Contribute to impactful frontend visualizations with React
 Take full ownership of your code from development to deployment ("You build it, you own it")
 Participate in agile ceremonies and continuous delivery practices
 Help maintain platform stability and improve user experience across domains


Requirements

 Extensive experience in backend and fullstack development (Java, Spring Boot, TypeScript, Node.js)
 Proficiency with React and CSS for frontend development
 Hands-on experience with AWS (Lambdas, ECS) and managing web apps in cloud environments
 Strong knowledge of NoSQL databases (DynamoDB) and solid SQL fundamentals
 Familiarity with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform) and DevOps practices
 Passion for clean, performant, and well-tested code
 Excellent communication skills in English (other languages are a plus)
 Strong team spirit and a proactive, collaborative work approach


Benefits

 Hybrid work: Combine flexible remote work with team days at the office
 Workation: Work temporarily from within the EU, Iceland, Liechtenstein, or Norway
 Permanent employment with a trusted European brand
 Monthly "Self-Education Day" dedicated to personal development
 27 vacation days + 3.5 additional days off (Christmas, New Year's Eve, Carnival)
 Buddy program to support onboarding and integration
 Individual learning and development opportunities
 Engaging team and company events
 Health Pass: free access to sports, fitness, and wellness programs (online/offline)


Jobgether hiring process disclaimer

This job is posted on behalf of one of our partner companies. If you choose to apply, your application will go through our AI-powered 3-step screening process, where we automatically select the 5 best candidates.

Our AI thoroughly analyzes every line of your CV and LinkedIn profile to assess your fit for the role, evaluating each experience in detail. When needed, our team may also conduct a manual review to ensure only the most relevant candidates are considered.

Our process is fair, unbiased, and based solely on qualifications and relevance to the job. Only the best-matching candidates will be selected for the next round.

If you are among the top 5 candidates, you will be notified within 7 days.

If you do not receive feedback after 7 days, it means you were not selected. However, if you wish, we may consider your profile for other similar opportunities that better match your experience.

Thank you for your interest!

The hiring process is broken. Candidates waste time applying for jobs that don’t match, and companies get buried in irrelevant applications.

At Jobgether, we’re changing the game. Our AI-powered platform connects top talent with the right opportunities—fast. Instead of receiving hundreds of random applications, companies get introduced to the top 5–10 candidates who truly fit the role.

Our technology understands more than just keywords—it interprets skills, experience, and intent to create meaningful connections.

We eliminate the noise, automate the manual work, and let people focus on what really matters: hiring smarter and finding the perfect job, no matter where you are.
